channel.title: Timeline on ankushKun
channel.description: Recent content in Timeline on ankushKun

item.title: EIR at FWD
item.description: BetterIDEa has been aquired and I have been hired by Forward to continue developing developer tools for the ecosystem ü•≥

item.title: Weavers Raid III
item.description: Build a Vercel like deployment platform for permaweb apps. Won third place

item.title: ArweaveIndia Demo Day
item.description: Demoed BetterIDEa and clickoor

item.title: Community Manager @ ArweaveIndia
item.description:
• Helping out the community
  • Managing the Arweave India Discord server
  • Organising cool events
  • Make coold builds

item.title: Launched Clickoor Camera ‚ìê!
item.description: A point and shoot camera, powered by the Arweave Blockchain, that has an infinite and permanent storage for your valuable photos

item.title: UPES, Dehradun: Hackathon 8.0
item.description: Built an AI enabled web browser for detecting sus activities on websites. One of the top 5 projects

item.title: AO testnet Launch - 27th Feb, 2024!
item.description: Launched BetterIDEa

item.title: Arweave India Launchpad program!
item.description:
• Three month program
  • Building BetterIDEa as a product

item.title: Met Sam Williams IRL at Bangalore!
item.description: AO reveal to India hackers

item.title: Won the Arweave ‚ìê Hackerhouse at Bangalore
item.description:
• Built a web based IDE for Arweave Smartweave contracts
  • Arweave Cohort 1
  • Amazing People, Amazing Experience
  • Long term friends made

item.title: Runner up in Crewsphere College level ICP hackathon!
item.description: Built ICPixel

item.title: Got selected as an Arweave Scholar!
item.description:
• Built GitAR: A bounty platform for Arweave projects
  • Fully sponsored trip to Arweave India Hackerhouse in Bangalore from 3rd to 6th December
  • (Kya matlab exams shuru ho rahe hai 1st December se üò≠)

item.title: Participated in E-Suraksha hackathon at CU
item.description: Really bad experience, organisers were not fun, they took away my airplane :(

item.title: ETH Global 2023!
item.description:
• Won Tableland Prize Pool üèÜÔ∏è
  • Build GitRaven with Tableland database

item.title: Participated in a 3 day workshop on Internet Computer Protocol
item.description:
• Learnt Motoko
  • Deployed ICPixel on the mainnet

item.title: Participated in Polkadot Ink Hackathon by Encode Club
item.description:
• Built a Polkadot based game item marketplace
  • Didn’t win anything but atleast it was a good experience, did pitch practice and pitched in front of Judges

item.title: Placed second in Hack-O-Octo!
item.description:
• The hackathon that changed the direction of my life
  • Built GitRaven

item.title: Started weebletstore.in
item.description: Anime merch store

item.title: Got invited to IIT Guwahati IEEE GCON Conference!
item.description:
• Participated in Vegathon finals at GCON
  • Won first prize üí™
  • Great experience

item.title: Got shortlisted into top 6 teams to the POC stage of Vegathon
item.description:
• Started intense development of our Indigenous Flight Controller
  • Sleep is for the weak?

item.title: Accpeted for CDACs GCON Vegathon
item.description:
• Got the opportunity to work with VEGA Microcontrollers
  • CDAC provided us with a VEGA Aries V2 board for the Hackathon

item.title: Qualified for Level 2 of Gujarat Robofest
item.description:
• Our underwater drone proposal got accepted
  • Got ‚Çπ50k funding from Gujarat Govt. to build a Proof Of Concept

item.title: Visited IIT Roorkee during Cognizance (Their TechFest)!
item.description:
• Participated in Blockathon
  • Developed BBIP - Blockchain Based Identification Protocol
  • Participated in Intel OneAPI workshop + hackathon
  • Won 1st prize in the OneAPI Hackathon ü•á
  • Got ‚Çπ12k worth amazon gift card as the prize

item.title: Participated in HackNSUT '23
item.description:
• Built an attendance NFT reward system
  • 5irechain
  • Madhur Virli Standup :O
  • Teamed up with online friends for offline hackathon

item.title: First hackathon win of the year - SheBuilds!
item.description:
• Used Rust for the first time, loved it üò≥
  • Built Smart Contracts on Concordium Blockchain
  • Concordium track runnerup ü•à

item.description: By GDG Ludhiana (it was their first time organising DevFest too)

item.title: Won the Neighbourhood Hacks 2 Hackathon!
item.description:
• Won best use of DeSo
  • Won most creative use of DeSo

item.title: Won WeMakeDevs <> Stream hackathon on Devpost!

• Built a game with Unity
  • Won ‘Best educational game’ track

item.description:
• First real offline hackathon
